title: Chapter 13: Cognitive Planning with Large Language Models
description: Once a robot can perceive its environment and understand human speech, the next frontier is enabling it to reason about high-level commands and generate a sequence of actions to achieve them. This is where Large Language Models (LLMs) like GPT-4 and Claude 3 serve as a "cognitive engine" for the robot, translating natural language into actionable plans.
